title: Week 13 NFL Recap & Reaction: Lions win 1st game, Steelers surprise Ravens, Minshew Mania returns + Playoff Picture & Winners/Losers (Football 12/6)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech recap all the action from Week 13 in the NFL.
(5:00) Chiefs-Broncos
(16:30) Lions-Vikings
(25:00) Steelers-Ravens
(36:45) Chargers-Bengals
(44:30) 49ers-Seahawks
(53:15) Eagles-Jets
(1:03:30) WFT-Raiders
(1:13:30) Dolphins-Giants
(1:19:45) Cardinals-Bears
(1:22:45) Bucs-Falcons
(1:27:00) Rams-Jaguars
(1:29:00) Colts-Texans
(1:34:30) Playoff Picture

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
